import"./VerifyForgotPassword.scss";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{verifyForgotPassWord}from"../../services/UserService";import{Routers}from"../../utils/Constants";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function VerifyForgotPassword(_ref){let{}=_ref;const[token,setToken]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const[error,setError]=useState('');const location=useLocation();const{email}=location.state||{};const[resendSuccess,setResendSuccess]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{setResendSuccess("Token verification send your email.");setTimeout(()=>setResendSuccess(""),5000);},[]);const handleCancel=()=>{navigate(-1);};const handleSendTokenToEmail=async()=>{// navigate(Routers.ChangePassword, { state: { email: email, token: token}});
await verifyForgotPassWord(email,token).then(data=>{navigate(Routers.ChangePassword,{state:{email:email,token:data.token}});}).catch(error=>{setError(error.message);return;});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"verify_account_page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"verify_account",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"verify_account--header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"title",children:"X\xE1c minh qu\xEAn m\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"verify_account--body",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"input_token",value:token,onChange:e=>{setToken(e.target.value);},placeholder:"Nhập token"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message_error",children:error}),resendSuccess&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message_resend",children:resendSuccess})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"verify_account--footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:handleCancel,className:"footer_btn footer_btn--cancel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"btn_title",children:"H\u1EE7y"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:handleSendTokenToEmail,className:"footer_btn footer_btn--verify",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"btn_title",children:"X\xE1c th\u1EF1c"})})]})]})});}
